name: Introduction to Restoration and 18th-Century Literature
description: This course introduces students to the works of Restoration and 18th-Century authors, including the great English novelists such as Alexander Pope, Samuel Johnson, and Daniel Defoe.

name: Restoration and 18th-Century Poetry
description: This course focuses on the poetry of the period, including the works of John Dryden, Alexander Pope, and Jonathan Swift.

name: Restoration and 18th-Century Drama
description: This course explores the plays of the period, including the works of William Congreve, George Farquhar, and Richard Brinsley Sheridan.

name: Restoration and 18th-Century Novels
description: This course examines the novels of the period, including the works of Daniel Defoe, Samuel Richardson, and Henry Fielding.
